roofSelection.title: Choose your roof type
roofSelection.subtitle: Get started by letting us know the roof shape that most closely resembles your roof
roofDimensions.title: Enter dimensions
roofDimensions.subtitle: Enter these measurements, to help us find the total area of the roof
roofDimensions.protrusions.title: Are there any protrusions?
tileSelection.title: Select a tile
tileSelection.subtitle: You can now choose from different roofing tiles. In the next step you can select the tile colour.
tileSelection.empty: Couldn't find suitable tiles for the entered dimensions. Please click "Go back" and double-check the dimensions.
variantSelection.title: Select your tile colour
variantSelection.subtitle: These are the tile colour options available for the chosen product range.
tileOptions.title: Tile options and accessories
tileOptions.subtitle: Here you can choose more tile options and accessories.
tileOptions.verge.title: Select verge detail
tileOptions.verge.help: These are the available tile options for your tile product selection.
tileOptions.ridge.title: Select ridge detail
tileOptions.ventilationHood.title: Select ventilation hood items
underlaySelection.title: Now, select the underlay
underlaySelection.subtitle: These are the available options for your tile product selection. You can remove your underlay later, if required.
underlaySelection.empty: Couldn't find suitable underlays for the entered dimensions. Please click "Go back" and double-check the dimensions.
guttering.title: Now, choose your guttering options
guttering.subtitle: Choose the available guttering option. Skip this step if you don’t want to add guttering to the estimation.
guttering.gutter.title: Choose a gutter material
guttering.gutterVariant.title: Select the colour
guttering.gutterHook.title: Select a gutter hook type
guttering.downPipe.title: Add down pipe (3m lengths)
guttering.downPipeConnectors.title: How many downpipes connectors?
results.title: Your solution contains
results.subtitle: Disclaimer: We strive to be within 5-10% accurate. We've also added a wastage contingency of: {{contingency}}% into this material calculation
results.areaLabel: For the total measured area for your roof
results.table.title: Product
results.alerts.quantities.title: Quantities update
results.alerts.quantities.text: Changing the quantities may affect the accuracy of the estimates.
results.alerts.needToKnow.title: Need to know
results.alerts.needToKnow.text: We’ve added a wastage contingency of: {{contingency}}% into this material calculation.
validation.errors.positiveNumberOnly: This field must have a positive number
